directions: Stir chicken, cream cheese, blue cheese dressing, hot pepper sauce, crumbled blue cheese, and ranch dressing together in a slow cooker.
Cook in the slow cooker on High until heated through, about 20 minutes.
ingredients: 1/2 cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)
1/4 cup ranch dressing, or to taste
title: Amazing Buffalo Dip
